Class SamplerCondition<V>

Type Parameters:
V - the type of variable to sample
All Implemented Interfaces:
Condition
public class SamplerCondition<V>
extends Object
implements Condition

A condition that is satisfied when a sampled variable satisfies some criteria.

explainDissatisfaction

public String explainDissatisfaction()
Description copied from interface: Condition
Explain the condition's most recent dissatisfaction. This method is meaningful only if the most recent isSatisfied() returned false.

Note: This method should not change the condition's state.

Specified by:
explainDissatisfaction in interface Condition
